location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter No 62 from Ephraim Gerrish Stannus, Resident in the Persian Gulf, at Muscat to William Newnham, Chief Secretary to the Government, Political Department, Bombay

mods.abstract: The letter is acknowledging the receipt of a communication, dated 24 September 1824, and conveys the gratitude of the Resident over the increase granted to the table expenses of the Bushire Residency.
